reference.title: TimeRangeCollection class
reference.shortdesc: The TimeRangeCollection utility class abstracts the notion of an ordered collection of TimeRange specifications and provides services to translate itself into a Metadata instance.

section.p: The type parameter, which is the first positional parameter in the signature of the constructor methods, is an instance of the TimeRangeCollection#Type enumeration. This is part of the TimeRangeCollection class. The values that are currently defined by this enumeration are MARK_RANGES, DELETE_RANGES, and REPLACE_RANGES. You can create TimeRangeCollection objects using these three types.
